surface_layer.definition: The regions of the surface, atmosphere, and hydrosphere of the earth (or analogous parts of other planets) occupied by living organisms.

deep_layer.mechanism: Complex interaction of different processes on earth.
deep_layer.origin: Emerges as the result of the evolution of life on earth.

epistemic_metadata.source: Atmospheric oxygen | Earth and Atmospheric Sciences | Research Starters | EBSCO Research
